metadata.title: CVE-2020-35680 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: smtpd/lka_filter.c in OpenSMTPD before 6.8.0p1, in certain configurations,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference and daemon crash) via a crafted pattern of client activity,because the filter state machine does not properly maintain the I/O channelbetween the SMTP engine and the filters layer.

criterions.comment: opensmtpd package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
